Song.title: Good to Me
Song.copyright: Audrey Assad | Â© 2013 Audrey Assad Inc. (Admin. by Audrey Assad / Fortunate Fall Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E | A/E | E E2 | A/E |]
Verse 1: I [E]put all my [E2]hope [E] in the truth of Your [C#m9]promise [A2] And I [E]steady my [Esus]heart [E] on the ground of Your [C#m9]goodness [A2] When I'm [F#m7]bowed down with [C#m7]sorrow, I will [A2]lift [E]up Your [Bsus]name [B] And the [F#m7]foxes in the [C#m7]vineyard will not [E/A]steal my [Bsus]joy [B]
Chorus: (Because) [E]You [E2]are [E]good to me, good to me, [E/A]You are good to me, good to me, (1st Ending) [C#m7]You are [Bsus]good to [E]me [Esus E] (to Verse 2) (2nd Ending) [C#m7]You are [Bsus]good to [F#m7]me [E/G# A2 Bsus] (to Bridge & ending)
Verse 2: And [E]I lift my [E2]eyes [E] to the hills where my [C#m9]help is found [A2] And Your [E]voice fills the [Esus]night, [E] raise my head up to [C#m9]hear the sound [A2] And when [F#m7]fires burn all a[C#m7]round me, I will [A2]praise [E]You my [Bsus]God [B] And the [F#m7]foxes in the [C#m7]vineyard will not [E/A]steal my [Bsus]joy [B]
Bridge: Your [E]goodness and mercy shall [E/A]follow me [A2] all my [F#m11]life [C#m7] I trust in Your [Bsus]promise [B] Yeah Your [E]goodness and mercy shall [E/A]follow me [A2] all my [F#m11]life [C#m7] I trust in Your [Bsus]promise [B] Yeah Your [E]goodness and mercy shall [E/A]follow me [A2] all my [F#m11]life [C#m7] I trust in Your [Bsus]promise [B]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i put all my hope in the truth of your promise and i steady my heart on the ground of your goodness when im bowed down with sorrow i will lift up your name and the foxes in the vineyard will not steal my joy chorus because you are good to me good to me you are good to me good to me 1st ending you are good to me to verse 2 2nd ending you are good to me to bridge ending verse 2 and i lift my eyes to the hills where my help is found and your voice fills the night raise my head up to hear the sound and when fires burn all around me i will praise you my god and the foxes in the vineyard will not steal my joy bridge your goodness and mercy shall follow me all my life i trust in your promise yeah your goodness and mercy shall follow me all my life i trust in your promise yeah your goodness and mercy shall follow me all my life i trust in your promise
